modal.title: Backend Development
items: Design and develop scalable, event-driven systems using Java and Spring Boot.
Build real-time data processing solutions with Apache Kafka integration.
Develop automated systems for anomaly detection and root cause identification.
Create RESTful APIs and microservices architecture for enterprise applications.

modal.title: System Architecture
items: Design microservices and event-driven architectures for scalable systems.
Optimize infrastructure costs and improve operational efficiency.
Implement system design patterns for high-performance applications.
Lead architecture decisions for cross-functional initiatives.

modal.title: Automation & DevOps
items: Automate recurring manual operations to improve developer efficiency.
Build custom workflow automation solutions saving significant costs.
Implement CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployments.
Optimize system performance and reduce operational overhead.

modal.title: Project Leadership
items: Lead development teams and drive end-to-end project delivery.
Act as project manager and lead developer for critical initiatives.
Coordinate cross-functional teams and deliver scalable solutions.
Mentor developers and establish best practices for code quality.
